summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Comptroller to draw and the City Treasurer to pay a warrant on the local improvement fund, District No. 2480, for the improvement of Twenty-sixth Avenue South et al, by grading, etc., in favor of John W. Roberts, assignee of Andrew Peterons, contractor for said improvement, for the purpose of paying the Superior Court Judgment against the City of Seattle in Cause No. 105,681 of said Court, and declaring an emergency.
